content.text:
# 1989 Country Music Association Awards

The 1989 Country Music Association Awards, 23rd Ceremony, was held on October 9, 1989, at the Grand Ole Opry House, Nashville, Tennessee, and was hosted by CMA Award Winners, Anne Murray and Kenny Rogers.
Winners and nominees
Winner are in Bold.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Entertainer of the Year
! style="background:#EEDD85; width=50%" |Album of the Year
|-
| valign="top" |
* George Strait
** Reba McEntire
** Ricky Van Shelton
** Randy Travis
** Hank Williams, Jr.
| valign="top" |
* 'Will the Circle Be Unbroken Vol. II — Nitty Gritty Dirt Band'
** Beyond the Blue Neon — George Strait
** Loving Proof — Ricky Van Shelton
** Old 8×10 — Randy Travis
** Willow in the Wind — Kathy Mattea
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82; width=50%" |Female Vocalist of the Year
|-

** Rodney Crowell
** George Strait
** Randy Travis
** Keith Whitley

** Rosanne Cash

** "A Better Man" — Clint Black

| valign="top" |
